item.title: Active Recon Resources
item.description: Active Reconnaissance To gather intelligence by actively engaging the target. In the active recon phase, we’re planning our future phases, like exploitation, by actively collecting information on the target. Few examples: ~ What targets were found and what ports are open?
item.dc:creator: Matt Raupfer
